shaman 2.0
  • Home

  • Reference

Reference

Data processing

shaman_shuffle_hic_track()

generate an expected hic track based on observed hic data

shaman_score_hic_track()

generate a score hic track based on observed and expected (shuffled) hic data

shaman_shuffle_and_score_hic_mat()

Inline function for generating an expected matrix and computing the score for a given interval

shaman_score_hic_points()

generate a score matrix for observed data based on the expected for a given set of points

shaman_score_hic_mat()

generate a score matrix for observed data based on the expected for a given 2D focus interval

shaman_kk_norm()

Compute a score matrix for observed data based on the expected for a given set of points

shaman_generate_feature_grid()

Calculate spatial enrichment of contacts between two features

Visualization

Methods for graphical visualizing

shaman_plot_map_score_with_annotations()

plots hic normalized map with annotations

shaman_gplot_map_score()

plot a normlized hic map

shaman_gplot_map()

plot an observed or expected hic map

shaman_plot_feature_grid()

Plot spatial enrichment of contacts between two features

shaman_score_pal()

Returns the color palette used to display normalized scores

configuration

Parameter configuration utility functions

shaman_get_test_track_db()

returns test misha db

get_param_list()

Get params from saved var

get_param()

Get params from saved var

init_params()

Read params from files
